name: Turqu-chan in the Hentai Laboratory
description:
Help the Turqu-chan escape from a mysterious organization
that has captured her and modified her equipment into a horny style!
Turqu-chan, who often escapes, causing facility damage, has been given a suggestion by the researchers...
If she can clear the 15 stages set by the researchers, they will let her go!
Can Turqu-chan successfully escape?

▽Overview

Top-down perspective. Evading enemies and solving puzzles.
If you get caught by enemies, a Hentai pixel animation will be triggered.
If energy drops below 50%, the Hentai pixel animation will also be triggered.
Additionally, there are scenes where Turqu-chan can be caught when her energy is abundant...





  • - Pixel animation combined with action puzzles
  • - 15 different H-scenes including mechanical and alien
  • - Three distinct stage styles: mechanical, botanical, and biological
  • - Memory mode
